brand.name: Stripe

signals: Our teams are based in offices around the world
process hundreds of billions of euros each year

valueProps.text: Manage revenue operations and launch new business models

facts.text: Stripe processes hundreds of billions of euros each year.
facts.evidence: process hundreds of billions of euros each year

facts.text: Stripe supports businesses across the AI ecosystem.
facts.evidence: Stripe supports businesses across the AI ecosystem

facts.text: Stripe offers a fully integrated, AI-powered platform.
Stripe helps manage revenue operations and launch new business models.
facts.evidence: manage revenue operations, and launch (or invent) new business models

facts.text: Stripe enables embedding financial services into platforms.
Stripe offers solutions for payments, subscriptions, invoicing, tax, and accounting.
Stripe helps reduce fraud using AI.
Stripe supports local payment methods to boost conversion.
facts.evidence: offer local payment methods to boost conversion

facts.text: Stripe allows the integration of payments into platforms or marketplaces.
facts.evidence: Integrate payments into your platform or marketplace

facts.text: Stripe provides tools to accept payments online and in person globally.
facts.evidence: accept payments online and in person from customers around the world

facts.text: Stripe offers prebuilt UIs for onboarding and paying out creators globally.
facts.evidence: Quickly onboard and pay out creators globally with prebuilt UIs

facts.text: Stripe's platform supports API requests peaking at 13,000 requests a second.
facts.evidence: API requests per day, peaking at 13,000 requests a second

facts.text: Stripe provides expert integration guidance from professional services team.
facts.evidence: Get expert integration guidance from our professional services team

facts.text: Stripe connects to Salesforce, SAP, and more through the Stripe App Marketplace.
facts.evidence: connect Stripe to Salesforce, SAP, and more through the Stripe App Marketplace
